data.text:
RiskLogix’s cloud based solution aCCelerate GRC recognised as Category Leader for Operational Risk Solutions by Chartis Research

RiskLogix, an international GRC operational risk software provider for the financial services industry today announced that has been named a Category Leader for its Operational Risk Solutions by Chartis Research in its “GRC Solutions, 2021: Market Update and Vendor Landscape” report. The report particularly recognizes RiskLogix for its ‘best in class’ functionality for its Risk Calculation Engine, advanced analytics, data manipulation and visualisation

John Kiddy, RiskLogix CEO said, “We are delighted to be recognised as a’ best in class’ Category Leader in the Operational Risk quadrant by Chartis Research.

We have been particularly active for some years in promoting and developing advanced methods for OpRisk quantification so are particularly excited that Chartis clearly sees this as a growing requirement in which we excel.

Our calculation engine provides complex curve fitting for a variety of scenarios and makes a very significant contribution to Operational Risk management and the sensitivities of risk profiles to change. Gaining insight into the real impact of events has never been more necessary than now, and we are grateful to Chartis for showcasing this vital area.”

Maryam Akram, Research Specialist at Chartis said ‘RiskLogix’s category leader position in the OpRisk quadrant reflects its advanced risk calculation and strong data management functionality – two core features of effective regulatory and risk reporting.’
